item.title: Twitter Analysis
item.description: THIS IS A COMPLETED PROJECT Given how most events moved online during COVID-19, having a strong digital presence is a huge advantage for organisations. Therefore, in this project, Iâ€™ve decided to find out whether Twitter is a good social media platform for departments at the LSE. This was an academic project. You can find some main features and code of this project below: Data Collection A mix of Twitter APIs and web scraping were used to collect information about departments at LSE.
